HERO.TITLE: Endless learning possibilities.
HERO.PARAGRAPH: On Socrates, unleash your power… That of knowledge and knowledge. Dive into the heart of the social network and discover many features that will allow you to interact with all members of the community and access thousands of knowledge in just a few clicks.

DOWNLOAD.TITLE: Test the application
DOWNLOAD.DESCRIPTION: Download the app and join the Socrates community now.

HERO.TITLE: What if your knowledge became your new superpower ?
HERO.DESCRIPTION: Get your invitation to join the private beta and discover Socrate, the social network of knowledge.

SHARE.TITLE: Share your knowledge with thousands of learners.
SHARE.PARAGRAPH_ONE: Create your profile in minutes and start earning money by sharing your knowledge.
SHARE.PARAGRAPH_TWO: Take advantage of new features that will allow you to federate your community and make your sales take off quickly.

CARD_ONE.TITLE: Create and monetise
CARD_ONE.DESCRIPTION: Your events, conferences, training, courses and podcasts.

CARD_TWO.TITLE: Messenger
CARD_TWO.DESCRIPTION: Discuss and connect with your learners.

CARD_THREE.TITLE: Cloud Socrate
CARD_THREE.DESCRIPTION: Host and share all your documents (videos, images, audio tracks)

CARD_FOUR.TITLE: Wallet
CARD_FOUR.DESCRIPTION: Manage your payments and view your invoices in a few clicks.

ADVANTAGE.TITLE: Enjoy exclusive benefits before the official launch.
ADVANTAGE.FIRST_AFTER: to the latest features of the social network.
ADVANTAGE.SECOND_AFTER: for all mentors until the official launch.
ADVANTAGE.THIRD: Be the first to use it and
ADVANTAGE.THIRD_AFTER: help us to improve Socrates according to your needs.
